compliant.legal provisions: The data subject has the right to request the correction of their personal data if it is inaccurate or incomplete.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The data controller must ensure that personal data is kept up to date and accurate, and must take reasonable steps to ensure that inaccurate data is rectified or deleted.
non_compliant.amend: Include specific procedures for data subjects to request corrections or updates to their personal data.
